title: CausalPre: Scalable and Effective Data Pre-processing for Causal Fairness
summary: This paper proposes CausalPre, a scalable and effective data pre-processing solution for causal fairness in databases. It addresses limitations of prior work by capturing broader attribute relationships critical to maintaining utility, without relying on a known causal model.
usefulness_reason: The paper focuses on "data pre-processing" for "causal fairness" in "databases". While not explicitly "contextual dataset" or "survey data", the concept of "causal fairness" and "attribute relationships" implies dealing with contextual information within a dataset. This makes it tangentially relevant to "Contextual dataset".
